```py
name: ai4foodsecurity
channels:
  - conda-forge
  - defaults
  - pytorch
  - nvidia
dependencies:
  - pandas==1.0.1
  - geopandas==0.8.2
  - rasterio==1.1.8
  - matplotlib==3.3.2
  - tensorboard==2.4.0
  - sentinelhub==3.3.2
  - pytorch==1.9.0
  - torchvision==0.10.0
  - numpy==1.19.5
  - sh==1.14.2
  - radiant-mlhub==0.3.0
  - ipykernel=5.3.4

  - 'cudatoolkit=11.1'
```

```py
conda create -n mycondaenv
conda activate mycondaenv
conda install numpy
```

```py
mamba create -n mymambaenv
mamba activate mymambaenv
mamba install numpy
```

```py
time conda create -y -n mycondaenv numpy

>> real 0m37,992s
```

```py
time mamba create -y -n mymambaenv numpy

>> real 0m27,722s
```

```py
time conda env update --file env.yml

user 10m4.853s
sys  0m12.286s
```

```py
time mamba env update --file env.yml

```

```py
conda install -n base conda-libmamba-solver
conda config --set solver libmamba
```
